attributes.action: Scrap Trident and use the money from it to research more eco-friendly power alternatives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this was done then it would increase the chance of being able to eradicate the unclean nuclear power source altogether, so removing many problems in one go.  And even if the research fails to come up with anything, it's got to be better than paying £20 billion to increase the amount of nuclear waste in our country. Also, if we get nuclear defence, we are encouraging other countries to do so, creating further pollution- therefore it is in everyone's interest to prevent this from happening.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
